outline:
1. to move noisily, confuse, make a noise, discomfit, break, consume, crush, destroy, trouble, vex
    1. (Qal)
      1. to move noisily
      2. to confuse, discomfit, vex
kjv_def: break, consume, crush, destroy, discomfit, trouble, vex.
strongs_def: properly, to put in commotion; by implication, to disturb, drive, destroy
